data.title: Caption.Ed – Accessibility
data.text:
Caption.ed, provides captions, downloadable transcripts and note-taking, licences are allocated to individual users. City’s Disability and Neurodiversity Team is piloting a limited number of licences from September 2022 as part of the Digital Accessibility Project.

Caption Ed provide an accessibility statement on their website.

There is not currently available a separate accessibility statement for the Caption.ed tools.
